review: Update**When I brought this product I hardly had an issues at first. Now it barely connects to my wifi. When I google this issue it says that I may be too far away from the modem, but all my other electronics work just fine. When it does connect it works great.I got this for my mom who is not so hip with the latest technology and she loves it. Although I don't like the set up as far as prime movies and the movies that cost. It makes me feel like my mom or nephew could accidentally buy something and not even know it. The remote is great but the battery port was a little confusing I had to google how to get it open! Other than that there were no problems connecting or streaming the movies. I haven't tried out the games yet, but I am sure they won't disappoint.
author: J. Simmons

review: So far we are very disappointed. The image is blurry, the sound has poor fidelity and the movies stop a great deal through out the program. The BestBuy technician says it is the router. We have bought anew more powrful router to see if there in improvement.We have Verizon FIOS service

review: Bought this product with high hopes to connect to my non smart tv's in my upper level of my home (ranch style home, router in basement).  Come to find out if your more then 20ft away it doesn't really work. Even with the extention plugged in. It connects to the internet in the menu, then disconnects when you choose a show or movie.  A big disappointment for me.
